Description: Rest on the flight into Egypt; to left, the Virgin seated at the foot of a tree in profile facing right, with the infant Christ seated on her knee, both of them playing with a bird, with St Joseph seated to right leaning against a tree and reading a book. c.1641 Etching
Producer name: Print made by: Stefano della Bella
Curator's comments: Dated c.1649 by De Vesme but c.1641 by Massar. See 1871,0513.42 for the third state.
